definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: This paper designs a new kind of self-timer system for the digital camera.
sentences.chinese: 文章設計了一種新型的數碼相機自拍系統。

sentences.english: With a digital camera, check the images as you shoot.
sentences.chinese: 如果是數碼相機，拍攝完就要檢查一下。

sentences.english: Quickly take a picture with DC then hurry back to the warm cart.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙用數碼相機拍了張照片就鑽回了溫暖的車廂裏。

sentences.english: After all, few people back then had digital cameras.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，當時很少有人有數碼相機。

sentences.english: Take a jump to see the key features and specifications of latest Sony Cybershot cameras.
sentences.chinese: 採取跳看到的主要功能和規格索尼最新的數碼相機。

sentences.english: Video Girl doll from Barbie comes with built-in digital camera.
sentences.chinese: 芭比娃娃的視頻女孩，帶有內置數碼相機。

sentences.english: If you want to save money to buy a new digital camera, you have to make every cent count.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想儲錢買一部新的數碼相機，你便要精打細算。

sentences.english: Taken a creepy picture with your cell phone or digital camera?
sentences.chinese: 用你的手機或者數碼相機照下來了吧？

sentences.english: But film is relatively limited in its range, as are digital cameras.
sentences.chinese: 但是膠捲被它自身的範圍所限制，數碼相機也一樣。

sentences.english: Kodak will ship a new digital camera DC215.
sentences.chinese: 柯達公司將推出一種新型的數碼相機DC215。

sentences.english: Although they often resemble traditional cameras, they don't use film.
sentences.chinese: 雖然外觀和傳統的相機相似，但數碼相機不用膠捲。

sentences.english: Digital cameras, for example, play a digitized version of an analog shutter.
sentences.chinese: 例如數碼相機就會播放模擬相機的快門的聲音。

sentences.english: In particular, they enjoy digital cameras, high-definition TVs, DVRs and Blu-ray players.
sentences.chinese: 他們尤其喜歡數碼相機，高清電視以及藍光播放器。

sentences.english: Sign up for computer lab, incubators, projector, and digital camera.
sentences.chinese: 確定計算機房，孵卵器，幻燈機和數碼相機等設備。

sentences.english: You will need a camera tripod and of course a digital camera to do this.
sentences.chinese: 你將需要相機三腳架，當然，少不了數碼相機。

sentences.english: She bought four Japanese digital cameras worth 560, 000 yen ($6, 300).
sentences.chinese: 張買了4架數碼相機，價值6300美元。

definition: body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
Kodak (brand, US film company)/full name Eastman Kodak Company 伊士曼柯達公司|伊士曼柯达公司[Yi1 shi4 man4 Ke1 da2 Gong1 si1]
film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
